references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work presented, as it introduces latent diffusion models, a key component of the ConceptMaster architecture.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper presents advancements in diffusion models, particularly with high-resolution image synthesis, which directly influences the quality and resolution of the generated videos in ConceptMaster.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is crucial to ConceptMaster for its feature extraction and multi-modal representation capabilities.
The Segment Anything Model (SAM) is utilized in ConceptMaster's data collection pipeline for precise concept extraction and image segmentation.

references.paper_title: Animatediff: Animate your personalized text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning
references.reason: This paper provides a method for animating images, which is a relevant technique used in ConceptMaster's related work and methodology.
